dmca.title: Hollywood Camera wants to close the shutter on links to copied video
dmca.body:
Dear Google DMCA Department,

Our company sells a single product, Hollywood Camera Work, which is a DVD set of video-training. Recently, under the search term "hollywood camera work", we came across several links to illegal download and sharing of pirated copies and RIPs of our product.

Our product has appeared on several of the search-listing pages, providing anyone with minimal computer-skills access to an illegal download of our product, using the primary search-term one would use to search for us (our product/company name).

We are simultaneously an AdWords advertiser, so a user simply has to decide to click our AdWords link to acquire the product legally, or click the infringer's link to download it illegally.

Search query: "hollywood camera work" 

Infringing webpages on the 2nd page:

www.start-linux.com/forum/read.php?f=2&i=2807&t=2807 - 79k 
dangdang.jsphome.com/appziso2.htm

On the 3rd page:	

board.verycd.com/t188728.html
www.spoono.com/3ds/view.php?x=410&tut_id=
www.ibew728.org/_dlsc2002/0000032c.htm
www.hysaint.idv.tw/blog/archives/000208.html

On the 4th page:	

emule.bbs.enet.com.cn/2005/05/21/0000051218.html 
nfodb.org/section _3_Apps_iso_nfo.html

On the 6th page:	

lib.verycd.com/2004/12/06/0000029406.html

On the 7th page:	

www.communigate.co.uk/oxford/theradcliffeinfirmary/forum.phtml?action=message&phpforum_id=1229 - 42k

On the 11th page:	

www.cgtrain.com/tutorial/ - 61k

On the 12th page:	

oemsoft.org/index.php?target=search&qt=CAM - 79k

On the 14th page:	

board.verycd.com/f43-600.html - 32k

On the 15th page:	

www.cg98.cn/showthread.php?goto=lastpost&t=56894 - 26k

On the 17th page:

lib.verycd.com/datum/archive/00021.html

Our product can be found at http://www.hollywoodcamerawork.us

We have contacted the infringers via a form or email provided on their websites. Our request to them has been to cease and desist any access to illegal download of our product.

Our request to Google is to remove this link in the search index to a DVD-RIP or sharing of our product.

We may be contacted at [private]@hollywoodcamerawork.us, attn. [private] or [private] by phone at [private].

As the sole copyright holder on this product, I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
Hollywood Camera Work
